==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|きん|き|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|きんき|y=o|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Proper noun===
{{wikipedia|Kinki}}
{{ja-pos|proper|きんき}}

# [[region]] around [[Osaka]], [[Kyoto]], [[Nara]]

====Usage notes====
Because of homophony with the English ''[[kinky]]'', some avoid the use of ''Kinki'' when they translate a proper noun.<ref>[http://www.theguardian.com/education/2014/may/21/kinki-university-changes-name-kindai ''Japan's Kinki University changes its name due to awkward English meaning''], ''The Guardian'', 2014</ref>

====Synonyms====

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|京阪|^けいはん}}: [[Kyoto]] and [[Osaka]]
* {{ja-r|京阪神|^けいはんしん}}: [[Kyoto]], [[Osaka]], and [[Kobe]]
* {{ja-r|京阪奈|^けいはんな}}: [[Kyoto]], [[Osaka]], and [[Nara]]
